entry.title: Dedicated guide architecture launched
entry.summary: Published individual URLs for compounds and minerals, replaced anchor-only learn cards, and enabled search/filter in the Learn directory.

entry.title: External citation framework added
entry.summary: Added inline citation markers and source blocks for dosing and safety claims, including FDA/DailyMed, ClinicalTrials, PubMed, and NIH ODS references.

entry.title: Experimental risk labeling standardized
entry.summary: Added prominent status badges and caution sections for experimental, discontinued, and region-limited therapies.

entry.title: Micronutrient expansion released
entry.summary: Added a comprehensive mineral set with consistency checks for dosing-language citations and provider-question structure.
